amendment.description: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in part II of House Rept. 105-431 to express that it is the sense of Congress that the U.S. government should make every effort to donate obsolete air traffic control equipment, including related reimbursable technical assistance, to eligible sub-Saharan African countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
